channel.title: Comments on: Why I started and continue to blog – #Meme15 on Blogging
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Niraj
item.dc:creator: Niraj
item.description: I started it as a fun and just to give my-self an online presence but now I got to know the value of blogging. Now I share my new invention and read others thought. It is an interesting and tasty feed to gain knowledge in every field.
item.content:encoded: I started it as a fun and just to give my-self an online presence but now I got to know the value of blogging. Now I share my new invention and read others thought. It is an interesting and tasty feed to gain knowledge in every field.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: For me writing the code is the easiest part of a post, trying to explaining what the code does in layman's terms is sometimes the hardest part
item.content:encoded: For me writing the code is the easiest part of a post, trying to explaining what the code does in layman’s terms is sometimes the hardest part

item.title: By: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.dc:creator: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.content:encoded:
COMMAS! That makes me happy.

Thank you for all of your blogs. They’ve helped me over the last couple of years more than you know.
